about_the_game:
Hentai Maid Club - this is a puzzle game. In this large universe, there are 2 mini-games, collect the picture piece by piece, and rotate the elements of the flyer so that to put everything together. So get ready for the puzzles. There are never too many puzzles!

If you dreamed of a luxurious housekeeper who will not only clean your house, but also fulfill all your secret desires, then this game is for you!
To win over your housekeeper, you need not only flattering compliments, but also an outstanding mind.
At your disposal will be 7 wonderful housekeepers who will fulfill your whims.
But if you want more than just cleaning, then your housekeeper will give you a task and if you cope with it you will be generously rewarded!
Each of the 7 housekeepers knows how to please you and how to satisfy your secret fantasies, you just need to pass their tests and enjoy the result!

Features
1. 7 lovely ladies.
3. 2 Mini games
4. Use your thinking and memory to win the game.
5. Nice music, sound effects.
6. Translated on English!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8,8.1,10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB GeForce or AMD
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
